basics.name: Alanna Melllor
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am currently a student at the Shidler's College of Business, University of Hawaii at Manoa. I am pursuing my BBA in both Management of Information Systems, as well as International Business. My expected graduation date it Fall 2024.

education.area: Management Information Systems and International Business (expected Fall 2024)

highlights: Customer service, table and reservation management, cashier operations
Ability to multi-task, ability to perform well under pressure, ability to work well with a team
Demonstration of flexibility in working both food and clothing sections of the store

volunteer.organization: UH Manoa Pacific Asia Travel Association (PATA)
highlights: Exploration of career and internship opportunities relating to the travel industry
Parterned elementary schoolchildren with high school students to foster healthy relationships and implement positive role models into the lives of young community memebers

awards.title: UH Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming and continuing college students that have maintained a GPA 3.8 or above
